title: SnowSlammer: Red Rock McGreers~ Shane
description: Fresh-faced intern Candi Bamberger flies to Beaver Creek, Colorado to scope out the action, but not the kind smokin’ snowboard star Shane McGreer has in mind! Shane shows her some amazing moves, and not just in the half-pipe. A rival puts Candi’s in deep freeze, but he's fallen hard! Back at the Ranch, Tess, Jake and Cassie have a surprise of their own! Can Shane warm Candi up in time for a McGreer Ranch Christmas Eve?
author: Lilly Christine
